string.name: header_title_list
string.value: Protect the file with restricted access.

string.name: header_title_readonly_tips
string.value: Users with the read-only permission can view the file, but cannot edit, copy, or print it.

string.name: header_title_edit_tips
string.value: Users with the change permission can view, edit, copy, record, or save the file, but cannot print it.

string.name: permissions_are_restricted
string.value: This file is protected, accessible only to specified users.

string.name: enter_a_complete_work_ID
string.value: Enter an employee ID and press Enter. Example: a00123456

string.name: MESSAGE_APP_GET_FILE_ASSET_ERROR
string.value: Failed to get file information. Please try again.

string.name: MESSAGE_APP_PARAM_ERROR
string.value: Failed to start the DLP application. Check the parameters and try again.

string.name: MESSAGE_APP_INSIDE_ERROR
string.value: Internal application error. Please try again.

string.name: MESSAGE_APP_GET_ACCOUNT_ERROR
string.value: Failed to obtain the account information. Please try again.

string.name: MESSAGE_APP_NO_ACCOUNT_ERROR
string.value: The account has not been logged in. Please log in and try again.

string.name: MESSAGE_SERVICE_INSIDE_ERROR
string.value: Internal service error. Please try again.

string.name: MESSAGE_DLP_CREDENTIAL_SERVER_ERROR
string.value: Failed to connect to the server. Check the network and try again.

string.name: MESSAGE_DLP_CREDENTIAL_TIMEOUT_ERROR
string.value: Service response timed out. Please try again.

string.name: MESSAGE_GENERATE_DLP_ERROR
string.value: Failed to set the document permission. Please try again.

string.name: MESSAGE_RECOVER_DLP_ERROR
string.value: Failed to delete the document permission. Please try again.

string.name: MESSAGE_APP_NOT_HAVE_PERM_VISIT
string.value: You do not have the permission to view the file. To apply for the permission, contact:%s

string.name: MESSAGE_APP_FILE_PARAM_ERROR
string.value: The document you opened is not in the correct format. Please try again.

string.name: MESSAGE_DLP_READ_ONLY
string.value: The file is read-only. You do not have the operation permission. Apply for the permission and try again.

string.name: permission_status_readOnly
string.value: This file is protected. You have the read-only permission.

string.name: permission_status_title
string.value: This file is protected. You have the read-only and change permissions.

string.name: MESSAGE_DLP_FILENAME_TOO_LONG
string.value: The encrypted file cannot be saved because the file name is too long. You are advised to shorten the file name by four characters before encrypting the file.

string.name: MESSAGE_DLP_OPEN_REJECT
string.value: The file has been opened. Close the file before encrypting it.

string.name: MESSAGE_DLP_ENCRYPTION_REJECTED
string.value: The file is being encrypted. Please open it after the encryption is complete.

string.name: MESSAGE_DLP_SYSTEM_NEED_TO_BE_UPGRADED
string.value: The system version is too early to open encrypted files on the system of a later version. Upgrada the system and try again.

string.name: MESSAGE_DLP_SYSTEM_IS_AUTHENTICATED
string.value: Your login information is not identified. This function is available only for enterprise users. Please log in to the enterprise account first.

string.name: MESSAGE_DLP_ENCRYPTION
string.value: Encryption in progress. Please try again later.

string.name: Permission_has_expired_description
string.value: Permission on this file has expired. To continue viewing, please contact %s.

string.name: Network_not_connected_description
string.value: The validity period of the file has been set. Please check the file permission first.

string.name: Timeout_is_not_supported
string.value: You cannot set the validity period to a date that has passed. You need to reset the validity period.
